title: WTB: T206 Solly Hofman backs - HELP!
author: atx840

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Solly Hofman backs - HELP!
posts.post_content:
Looking for the last remaining backs for a run.  The AB/SOV backs are common enough and several have shown up in recent auctions.  Much appreciate anyone letting these go.

American Beauty 350 Frame
Sovereign 350 Forest Green

Also looking for
Broad Leaf 350
Carolina Brights
Tolstoi (unconfirmed)

Thanks for looking!
Picked up a beater Sov, still looking for remaining backs. :)
